docs.subject: Welcome to SESA OnSiteX!
docs.text: You are now using the new version of OnSiteX. Please let us know if there are any problems.

docs.subject: Update coming soon
docs.text:
Some of you have been experiencing a problem where reports you put in seem to disappear and don't add in to your time. This problem happens once you hit 25 reports total.

Don't worry, your reports are still being submitted, and we can see them over here -- they just aren't showing up in the app.

We will be publishing a major update to the app shortly. It includes a fix for this issue and many other new features.

Thanks to everybody for using the app and giving us feedback!
